SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.network

Interface GameControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface GameControllerInterface extends Remote
The GameControllerInterface defines methods for controlling game actions remotely.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

  • Method Details

    • chooseColor

      boolean chooseColor(String nickname, String color, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose a color for their character.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player choosing the color.
      color - The color chosen by the player.
      listener - The GameListener instance to receive game-related notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the color choice was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • chooseGoal

      boolean chooseGoal(String nickname, int goalId, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose a goal.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player choosing the goal.
      goalId - The ID of the goal chosen by the player.
      listener - The GameListener instance to receive game-related notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the goal choice was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • chooseInitialCardSide

      boolean chooseInitialCardSide(String nickname, boolean front, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose the initial side of a card.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player choosing the card side.
      front - true if the front side of the card is chosen, false for the back side.
      listener - The GameListener instance to receive game-related notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the initial card side choice was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • playCard

      boolean playCard(String name, int cardIndex, boolean isFront, int x, int y, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to play a card on the game board.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player playing the card.
      cardIndex - The index of the card being played.
      isFront - true if the front side of the card is being played, false for the back side.
      x - The x-coordinate on the game board where the card is being played.
      y - The y-coordinate on the game board where the card is being played.
      listener - The GameListener instance to receive game-related notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the card play was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • drawCard

      boolean drawCard(String p, int cardIndex, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to draw a card from the deck.
      Parameters:
      p - The nickname of the player drawing the card.
      cardIndex - The index of the card being drawn.
      listener - The GameListener instance to receive game-related notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the card draw was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • sentPublicMessage

      boolean sentPublicMessage(String sender, String message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a public message from a player to all players in the game.
      Parameters:
      sender - The nickname of the player sending the message.
      message - The message content.
      Returns:
      true if the message was sent successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • sentPrivateMessage

      boolean sentPrivateMessage(String sender, String receiver, String message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a private message from one player to another player.
      Parameters:
      sender - The nickname of the player sending the message.
      receiver - The nickname of the player receiving the message.
      message - The message content.
      Returns:
      true if the message was sent successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • heartbeat

      void heartbeat(String nickname, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Sends a heartbeat signal to indicate the player is still active.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player sending the heartbeat.
      listener - The GameListener instance to receive game-related notifications.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.

    • disconnectPlayer

      void disconnectPlayer(String nickname) throws RemoteException, NotExistingPlayerException
      Disconnects a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to disconnect.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication issue occurs.
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist.
